name: Emperor: Battle for Dune
notes:
Recuerda Instalar el juego mediante el menú conceptual
> Run EXE inside wine prefix.

files.dune: N/A:Señala el instalador, solo para iniciar

content:
files:
- dune: "N/A:Se\xF1ala el instalador, solo para iniciar"
game:
  arch: win64
  args: -C
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Emperor Battle For Dune/Emperor.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Emperor Battle For Dune
installer:
- task:
    app: winxp
    description: Cambiando a Windows XP
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
    silent: true
